Text: Aaagh?!
Wh-Why...are his blows stronger than before?!

If that keeps happening...he'll eventually break
through her defenses...and she'll be split down
the middle.

In other words, if they continue like this with
Gamma's ineffective attacks...she'll inevitably
lose, and die.
...It'll be a problem if I don't have a budget!
A budget?!
Clever!
He dodged it?!
There's more where that came from...
Nice try!

Oh... He read my move and cut down the slime...
His ability to sense magic is really good as well...
Come on, Eta... Don't interrupt our one-on-one fight!

...If it's not gonna work, there's only one thing
left to do.
Whoa?!
Get back here...
Oh-whoa-whoa?!
You can transport people using slime?!

What's the matter? Feeling scared? Or are you taking
a moment to regroup?
...We're escaping.
Escaping?!
There's no way you can beat him, Gamma.
Seriously?! I can still fight!

Also, if my slime attacks aren't hidden...he can
predict my magic use.

We've secured a test subject for my experiments...who
I don't want to lose. So running away is the wisest
choice.
Why do you keep calling me a test subjectâ€”
Nghh...!
Quiet.

But even if we try escaping him...he's incredibly
agile!
Hey, are you even listeningâ€”

Heheh... Even so...he's no match for the slipperiness
of slime!
Huh?!
Whaaa?!
Hmph... You're not going anywhere!

Let's jump into the river while riding on the slime
like this!
Did you say "jump"?!
Jump?!
You bastaaards!
*gasp*
No!
Aaaagghh!!!
Y-You...shielded us!

...E-Even if my leg is severed...the mound of flesh
will quickly regenerate!
If I can be of use...in this way... Ughh...!
*gasp* Are you okay?!

...She just fainted... She's not dead yet...and won't
rot.
I'll turn...this slime...into a boat...
Gamma...use slime as an oar...and start rowing.
Huh?!
I'll keep control of the slime...

Which means I'll leave the physical labor to you.
For starters, do your best...and row with all your
might to the archipelago.
G-Got it!
We're flying?!

It was an impressive battle, but I failed to finish
them off... Well, no matter. The Herzog Family
no longer retains any prospect of resurrection.

That said, those girls... Are they really the Shadow
Garden that senile old fool mentioned?

It's hard to believe...but those defenses...
It seemed like they were truly controlling
the slime...

It's almost more plausible that this is some kind of
scheme by one of the factions within the Cult to
deceive me with this mysterious organization...
Whatever the case, my path forward is clear.

My power...will eventually surpass even the Rounds!
It will be the power...to capture this world!
Huff...huff... M-My arms...can't move anymore!
...We made it...

Ngh... It's so frustrating! All I can do...is run
away!
...But at least we were able to save her!

Let's contact Iota immediately and have her come pick
us up.
And so...that's how our investigation turned out...
I see. Sounds like you were put through the wringer.

(...So, she expanded on the oil story I told Eta,
turning it into a bit of a quest story. Quite the
skillful composition, I'll give her that.)

(Especially the part about encountering internal
conflict within the Cult and getting involved...even
though it feels out of left field in a remote town...
It's a classic and easy-to-follow premise. Not bad.)
But, Gamma...
My lord...?

(That being said, I'm not really a big fan of this
"struggling Gamma" plot line! It's kinda
frustrating!)

(Sure, it's a crisis and all that, but can you even
call that a proper battle in the first place?)

(Ack... It's no use... I can't picture it at all...!
It's like dealing with a philosophical question
that can never be solved.)

(...So, at times like this, it's best to switch gears
and change the subject!)

(That's right. I could never grasp Gamma's fighting
style. As a result, I failed spectacularly in training
her to use the sword...)

No, it's nothing. Thank you for your hard work on the
oil investigation.

Trying to find this ancient Shadow Wisdom lying
beneath the ground is no easy task... It requires
not only time, but also luck,
Luck...

Well, let's express gratitude for that luck tonight.
Because of it, you're alive right now.
My lord...!

*sob* My lord, you don't have to go to such lengths
for my sake! Ohh! I, Gamma, will strive even harder!
Right...

(Whew... Good job connecting it back to the crisis
plotline.)

(Yes, whether it's the discovery of an oil field or
Gamma's sword abilities, it's all ultimately down
to luck.)

(The only way to acquire these fruits of fortune is
to sleep on them. In other words, nothing can be
done.)
